body:
My feedback is all handled here. Thanks for making those changes. I agree with keeping the request machinery since it is using an async API now.

TC failue is #1015, and can be fixed by rebasing on master.

> Sorry for the large PR!

I think this is a fine size, and nothing to apologize for. It is nicely focused on one feature, and every change here was needed for that feature. It is also well tested, which makes it bigger, but not unnecessarily so. Nice work 🎉
